QuestData.Title: In Defense of Vakthros
QuestData.Description:
It's time, $n. The Primalist forces in the air are dwindling now that you've handled things on the ground.
Raszageth is calling in one of her lieutenants to reinforce the Primalist forces, thanks to your efforts.
I need you to handle this monster while I push forward to fight Raszageth and help Khadgar.
Look for my magic during your fight. I will do what I can to aid you.
It is time for Raszageth to face the fury of the Aspect of magic!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: One of Raszageth's lieutenants, bent on the destruction of the blue dragons.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Khadgar further upwards in Vakthros.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to see you adventurer. Time is of the essence!
